body_html: that was my initial thought, but I didn't want to drop code straight in before_call because it complicates other (potential) backends. I think I'll just add another plugin or make it part of the broadcast plugin.
body_text: that was my initial thought, but I didn't want to drop code straight in before_call because it complicates other (potential) backends.  I think I'll just add another plugin or make it part of the broadcast plugin.
body: that was my initial thought, but I didn't want to drop code straight in `before_call` because it complicates other (potential) backends.  I think I'll just add another plugin or make it part of the broadcast plugin.
